column4: morning: where does one change the file association on ubuntu 10.04 ... all my pdfs have become python files ( association that it )
you mean they have PDF icons?
or they open in your PDF app?
actually they are known pdf files but any double click brings gedit as opposed to evince yet both complain about trying to open a python file
so if you manually open them with evince, they load?
nope .. it too complains about not being able to open a python file
what makes you think they're PDF files?
true true ... to me they have become synonymous
well my desktop icons all when wierd too
if I knew, i would be asking ;)
discovered it is a system wide problem
